entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Chipewyan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -39.9°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
